body.name: KDG Modern Cordless Small Table Lamp, Portable LED Fabric Shade Desk Lamps, 5000mAh Rechargeable Battery Operated Lighting for Bedroom, Bedside, Bar, Living Room, Dining Room, Night Light(Gold)
deliveryMessages: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: 【Multi-functional Portable Cordless Design】 Practical LED table lamp has a simple and modern design, elegant lines outline the stylish body of the lamp, and when the light is turned on the soft light is distributed on the white PE plastic lampshade, creating an elegant and romantic atmosphere. It can be used not only in indoor places such as bedroom and study room, but also in coffee shops, dining bars, commercial restaurants and other places.

【Touch Switch and Stepless Dimming】LED adjustable desk lamp with reliable touch buttons installed on the lamp base, you can easily control on/off by tapping the lamp or long press to change the brightness, provides 3W 2700K soft and cozy warm light that can be adjusted from 5-100%. The highest brightness is used for working and studying, while the lower brightness can be used for parenting, meditation, watching movies and more. Suitable for all scenes and people of different ages.

【Built-in Battery】With safe and durable 5000mAh built-in rechargeable battery, it takes about 4-6 hours to charge. It can be used for about 10 hours when fully charged and at its brightest state (can also be used while charging), cordless and can be moved everywhere to meet your needs for lights in any space.

【Selected with Care】This desk lamp is 10.2 inches high, 5.7 inches wide and weighs 1.3LB in a compact size. Whether you are studying, reading or working, it won't take up too much space but provides enough illumination light. The lamp body is made of metal material, sturdy and durable. Surface coating spray paint, delicate texture. Selected PE material is made into the lampshade, which has good light transmission and won't hurt your eyes at the same time.

【Quality Service】 Stylish and compact LED desk lamp, multi-color available, suitable for self-use or gift for friends and relatives. If you have any questions after receiving the package, please feel free to contact us, we are happy to help you and give you a satisfactory solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: KDG Small Table Lamp LED portable desk lamp with multiple functions for different occasions. 1. RECHARGEABLE BATTERY: The LED desk lamp has a built-in rechargeable battery, which does not need to be connected to an electrical outlet and has no cord. This design makes it more portable, you can easily bring it to outdoor party or camping and other occasions to use. 2. Outdoor table lamps: Some table lamps are made of PE plastic shade, which is waterproof, so you can not only use it indoors, but also take it outdoors. (Lamps with fabric shades are recommended for indoor use.) You can use it in picnic, date or balcony and any other places where you need extra lighting. 3. Bedside Lighting: The LED table lamp can be connected to a wall socket and used as a bedside lamp to cozy up and help you sleep. You can also use it as an auxiliary light for reading, writing or performing other nighttime tasks. Or you can easily find your clothes or shoes in the dark when you get up. 4. LED BEADS: The table lamp uses LED beads as a light source, which is durable and non-glaring. The LED beads we use last longer and use less energy than other light bulbs, which means it won't be interrupted by frequent bulb changes or consume a lot of power.

KDG is a brand that focuses on customer experience. Our products are sold all over the world and are loved by consumers in all regions.We are very good at using simple methods to design products that are not simple. Such products are easy to match and not easy to be outdated. KDG Portable Cordless Table Lamp This LED cordless table lamp is battery-powered The touch dimming design and fast charging feature allow you to enjoy warm lighting with the convenience of technology. 360° surround lighting Move it anywhere LED energy-saving lamp beads Great gift for friends and family

Why choose KDG Table Lamp? Each table lamp is made of durable raw materials. Control the Switch by Easy Touch. The on/off switch can be easily adjusted by simply tapping the button on the top of the shade. Doesn't take up much space Rechargeable desk lamp can be placed anywhere with no wires to tie it down. Product includes Type C charging cable, power adapter not included. Parameter Color: Black or White Material: Metal + PE Plastic or Fabric Size: Φ5.9 × H10.2 inch Power: 3W LED Input Voltage: DC5V-2A Battery Capacity: 5000mAh Color Temperature: 2700K Adjustable Brightness: 10-100%

Stylish modern table lamp, elegant and versatile, exquisite appearance, small lamp body will not take up too much space, make your living room environment more neat and beautiful, not only functional, but also decorative. Portable table lamp, smooth lines design, simple and generous, can be skillfully integrated into a variety of home decorating style. The light is soft and not harsh, enhancing your illumination experience. Cordless portable table lamps, which are not limited by cords, can be used in different areas. Especially for bars and restaurants, using it can add a cozy atmosphere and provide a more relaxing and pleasant environment.

Choose a stable, non-flickering LED light source, so that the light transmitted is soft and comfortable, suitable for study or work, but also can be used as a bedside lamp to help you sleep. Stylish and simple design, can be matched with any environment, whether it is for your own use or a gift to friends and relatives are very suitable. This table lamp transmits a 360° wrap-around light that is moderately bright and not blinding, protecting your eyes with a great sense of ambiance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice small lamps
reviews.reviewText: My wife purchased two of these lamps for our bedroom. We are snowbirds and we spend the winter in Florida in our motor home. These are perfect bedside lamps. They provide sufficient light for our need. The dimming feature is an extra bonus. They recharge quickly and the charge lasts a long while. From our experience we can highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright and keeps a charge
reviews.reviewText: So cute. It is bright and keeps a long charge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: quality, well balanced base ,metal pole ,very nice warm light , simple, matte finish ,goes anyplace! I might get more. This little lamp sort of" disappears" for minimalists, as far as placement. You wont notice it unless its lighted up. You can dim it easily and you dont have to press the button just touch it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stuck on lowest brightness after one fay
reviews.reviewText: Was great when I took out out of the box. Adjustable setting for brightness. Day two it was getting fun so I plugged it in to charge it and now it's stuck on lowest brightness. Garbage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Many applications for this cute lamp.
reviews.reviewText: We have a kitchen with a dark little corner that needs light, but alas, no electrical outlet. This was a nice solution. The brighter-dimmer controls are very easy. It would also be useful in a power outage. I've only had it a couple days but my experience is that it will be just fine. The recharge time is a little longer than the seller indicates (more like 3 to 4 hours) but the good news is that the duration of use is also longer. I've gone to bed, left it on overnight and it is still on the next morning. The manual says don't run it all the way down to zero, but I don't see a way to avoid that given that there is no indicator of remaining charge. I ordered another so one can always be available while the other charges up. AMENDED notes, I did request a replacement for this item due to the USBc jack became unmoored inside the case, which means it can't charge. Hopefully future designs will improve upon that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my neice in LA. Poweroutages lately had her using lots of candles. So I chose a rechargeable lamp that gave out lots of light. She loves the 10 hr battery life and declared it cute! Win, win

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My youngest is potty training and a nightlight just wasn't enough. I corded lamp on our bathroom counter wasn't doable. I tried 3 other cordless lamps from Amazon. This thing is amazing. It's last for at least 11 hrs on full brightness. I do have to figure out where to buy the special bulb it comes with when we need to replace. Mine had a little scratch in the paint but other than that no complaints. It has a nice weight to it as well. Not flimsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable light that’s super cute
reviews.reviewText: Easy assembly, good source of light, touch to turn on and off. I have a living space with no floor outlets so this provides a nice little light.
